trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.

Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixConverter> to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> from an attribute string; use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Converters.MatrixValueSerializer> to create a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixConverter"></xref>.
Determines whether an object can be converted from a specific type to an instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
The context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the type can be converted to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether an instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
The context information of a type.
The desired type this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if this can be converted to destinationType; otherwise, `false`.
Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
To determine whether a conversion is possible without actually performing the conversion, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method.
The context information of a type.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> of the type being converted.
The object being converted.
The created from converting value.
The specified object is null or is a type that cannot be converted to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> to a specified type.
To determine whether a conversion is possible without actually performing the conversion, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method.
The context information of a type.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> of the type being converted.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> to convert.
The type to convert this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> to.
The object created from converting this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
The value is null or is not a , or the destinationType is not a valid conversion type.
